summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 2 new features: 'La Lettre du Père Daniel' page and 'Servir' page. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified working: Lettre page with hero, newsletter subscription form, and expandable letters list (2 seed letters); Servir page with hero and 13 service cards; Navigation updates ('Servir' in Je veux menu, 'Lettre' in Notre Dame d'Autan menu); Admin dashboard 'Lettres' tab with full CRUD; Footer newsletter form with backend integration.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/letters returns list of 2 seed letters ✅
Backend: POST /api/letters requires auth (401 without token) ✅
Backend: POST /api/letters creates letter with auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/letters/{id} requires auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/letters/{id} updates letter with auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/letters/{fake_id} returns 404 ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/letters/{id} requires auth ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/letters/{id} deletes letter with auth ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/letters/{fake_id} returns 404 ✅
Backend: POST /api/subscribers stores new email ✅
Backend: POST /api/subscribers with duplicate email returns existing (no duplicate) ✅
Backend: GET /api/subscribers requires auth ✅
Backend: GET /api/subscribers returns list with auth ✅
Backend: Auth login with admin/admin123 works ✅
Backend: Auth login with wrong credentials returns 401 ✅
Frontend: Lettre du Père Daniel page loads with hero section ✅
Frontend: Newsletter subscription form on Lettre page works (shows 'Merci pour votre inscription !') ✅
Frontend: 2 seed letters displayed ('Carême 2026', 'Bonne année 2026 !') ✅
Frontend: Clicking a letter expands to show full content ✅
Frontend: Servir page loads with hero section ✅
Frontend: Servir page shows 13 service cards ✅
Frontend: Service cards link to relevant pages (e.g., /liturgie-musique) ✅
Frontend: 'Servir dans la paroisse' appears in 'Je veux...' dropdown ✅
Frontend: 'La Lettre du Père Daniel' appears in 'Notre Dame d'Autan' dropdown ✅
Frontend: Admin dashboard has 'Lettres' tab with Mail icon ✅
Frontend: Admin Letters form has all required fields (Titre, Date, Contenu) ✅
Frontend: Admin can create new letter via form (toast shows 'Lettre publiée') ✅
Frontend: Admin Letters tab shows list of existing letters with edit/delete buttons ✅
Frontend: Footer newsletter form saves email to backend via /api/subscribers ✅
Frontend: Footer newsletter shows confirmation after submission ✅
seed_data_creation: 2 seed letters exist: 'Carême 2026 - Un temps de grâce' (Feb 20, 2026) and 'Bonne année 2026 !' (Jan 5, 2026). Seed subscriber test@paroisse.fr exists.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Letters and Subscribers APIs fully implemented and working. Admin dashboard now has 5 tabs: Actualités, Horaires des messes, Funérailles, Événements, Lettres. Servir page has 13 static service cards. Footer newsletter form shares same backend endpoint /api/subscribers as Lettre page. Test file /app/backend/tests/test_letters_subscribers_api.py covers all CRUD operations.

lettre_pere_daniel_page.hero: Working - shows 'La Lettre du Père Daniel' title with Mail icon
lettre_pere_daniel_page.newsletter_form: Working - email input + 'S'inscrire' button, shows confirmation after submit
lettre_pere_daniel_page.letters_list: Working - displays expandable letter cards with date badge

servir_page.hero: Working - shows 'Servir dans la paroisse' title with Heart icon
servir_page.service_cards: 13 cards displayed (Chorale, Lecteurs, Art Floral, Servants d'autel, Catéchisme, Aumônerie, Éveil à la Foi, Parcours Alpha, Service d'écoute, Visite des malades, Secours Catholique, Équipe funérailles, Service Accueil)

navigation_updates.je_veux_menu: 'Servir dans la paroisse' option added, links to /servir
navigation_updates.notre_dame_autan_menu: 'La Lettre du Père Daniel' option added, links to /lettre-pere-daniel

admin_letters_tab.features: Create, edit, delete letters with toast notifications
